title: Create skill framework and entry point
description: Set up the Claude Code skill structure with main entry point. Define the skill manifest, command patterns, and core architecture for handling requests.
close_reason: Created skill framework with SKILL.md manifest and 5 commands (capture, task, today, inbox, review). Added PARA, GTD, and TASKS resource files. Skill follows Claude Code plugin structure with YAML front matter.

title: Implement smart recommendations
description:
Add intelligence layer that proactively helps users:

**Organization Suggestions:**
- When creating tasks/notes, suggest Tags (Areas/Resources) based on content
- Recommend Projects for orphaned tasks
- Suggest converting multi-task items into Projects
- Identify notes that should be Web Clips (have URLs)

**System Health Checks:**
- Tasks in 'Doing' projects but no due dates
- Notes in inbox > 1 week old
- Tasks with unclear next actions
- Projects with no recent activity
- Someday items not reviewed in > 1 month

**Smart Defaults:**
- Remember frequently used Projects/Tags
- Suggest due dates based on patterns
- Auto-detect recurring patterns
close_reason: Created health.md and suggest.md commands. Added smart defaults section to SKILL.md for tag detection, project detection, due date patterns, and duplicate prevention.

title: Add productivity coaching and system explanation
description:
Help users unfamiliar with PARA/GTD understand and get value from the system:

**Explain Features:**
- explain para: Explain PARA methodology and how it's implemented in UB
- explain gtd: Explain GTD and the Process page
- explain <feature>: Contextual help for any UB feature (My Day, Tags, Projects, etc.)

**Coaching/Recommendations:**
- When creating items, suggest appropriate organization (Area tags, Projects)
- Recommend when to break a task into a project (multiple sub-tasks, deadline)
- Suggest creating Ongoing projects for maintenance tasks
- Nudge users toward daily review habit
- Identify when inbox is getting too full

The skill should be a knowledgeable guide, not just a CRUD interface.
close_reason: Created explain.md command, FEATURES.md resource with detailed explanations, and coaching guidelines in SKILL.md.

title: Implement status and review commands
description:
Build status and review commands for daily/weekly productivity rhythms:

**Daily Operations:**
- stuck: Show overdue tasks, tasks without due dates in active projects, stale inbox items
- myday: Show My Day dashboard status (planned vs done)
- projects: Show active projects with task counts and overdue status

**Review Workflows:**  
- daily-review: Guide through daily review (check Today, process Inbox, plan tomorrow)
- weekly-review: Guide through GTD weekly review (process all inboxes, review projects, check someday)
- process <item>: Help clarify/organize a single inbox item (Is it actionable? 2-min rule? Calendar vs Next?)

**GTD-Specific:**
- gtd: Show GTD dashboard (Do Next, Delegated, Someday, Calendar, Deferred counts)
- someday: Surface forgotten someday items for review
close_reason: Status commands verified: /today shows My Day tasks, due today, and overdue. Created test tasks to demonstrate. Notion MCP queries and formatting working.

title: Ultimate Brain Skill - Intelligent Notion Assistant
description: Build a Claude Code skill that acts as an intelligent front-end for Ultimate Brain in Notion. The skill should interpret natural language requests, recommend how to use features, manage workflow (tasks, notes, projects), provide insights, and coach productivity using PARA/GTD methodologies.
close_reason: Epic complete. All features implemented: schema mapping, skill framework, quick capture, status commands, recurring tasks, time tracking, productivity coaching, smart recommendations, insights/analytics.

title: Implement recurring task and time tracking support
description:
Add commands for advanced UB features:

**Recurring Tasks:**
- recur <task> <schedule>: Set up recurring schedule (daily, weekly, M/W/F, monthly, etc.)
- View and manage recurring task patterns
- Handle 'Next Due' calculations

**Time Tracking:**
- start <task>: Start tracking time on a task
- stop: End current work session
- tracked: Show time tracked today/this week

These features differentiate UB from basic task managers and should be supported.
close_reason: Recurring tasks and time tracking verified working. Created recur.md and track.md command docs with proper Recur Unit values (Day(s), Week(s), Month(s)) and Work Sessions integration.

title: Implement insights and analytics
description:
Build analytics and insights for productivity tracking:

**Project Health:**
- Progress % (done/total tasks)
- Overdue task count
- Time tracked vs estimated
- Days since last activity

**Goal Tracking:**
- Milestone completion %
- Projects contributing to each goal
- Target deadline proximity

**Productivity Patterns:**
- Tasks completed per day/week
- Most productive days/times (from time tracking)
- Completion rate trends
- Average task age in inbox

**Reports:**
- weekly-summary: What got done this week
- project-status <project>: Deep dive on a project
- goals: Progress toward all active goals
close_reason: Created stats.md and report.md commands for productivity metrics, weekly summaries, project status, and goal tracking reports.

title: Implement quick capture actions
description:
Build quick action commands that match daily usage patterns:
- capture <text>: Quick capture to Task/Note inbox
- task <title> [--project=X] [--due=date]: Create task with smart defaults
- note <title> [--tag=X]: Create note with optional tag
- done <task-search>: Mark task complete
- today: Show today's tasks (both due today and My Day items)
- inbox: Show items needing processing (tasks without project, notes without tag)

These are the most frequent interactions - optimize for speed and minimal friction.
close_reason: Verified Notion MCP integration works: create task in inbox, update task status. Core capture/done functionality operational.

title: Map Ultimate Brain database schemas
